name: rspec3
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0
body: |- wi(w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c2)), w0)
-| wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wral(s2, c2, w0)))
